Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Creates the federal contract workers assistance program
Summary: Creates the federal contract workers assistance program to permit the state to provide loans to certain small businesses affected by the federal government shutdown.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to creating the federal contract workers assistance program
